ComicInfo.Summary:
Marla is drawn deeper into the mystery surrounding the missing ship plans even as she comes to grips with her own troubled past. But who - or what - is stalking her through the snowy streets of New York? As friends are unmasked, enemies circle... leaving Marla's alter ego Miss Fury all alone to fight a foe she can barely comprehend!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Tula Lotay | 1 | B | Cover B | Jonathan Ang Lau & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C/RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Jonathan Ang Lau | 3 | D/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Jonathan Ang Lau & Ivan Nunes | 4 | E/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Tula Lotay | 5 |
